scripts.quality:check: npm run quality:schema && npm run quality:types && npm run quality:standards
scripts.quality:fix: npm run quality:fix-docs && npm run quality:fix-eslint
scripts.validate:deployment: npm run quality:check && npm run build && echo '✅ DEPLOYMENT VALIDATION PASSED'
scripts.build:production: npm run quality:check && vite build --mode production
scripts.audit:comprehensive: npm run quality:schema && npm run quality:standards && npm run quality:docs
scripts.setup:quality-gates: chmod +x pre-commit-quality-gate.sh && chmod +x update-markdown-docs.sh && echo 'Quality gates configured'
scripts.ci:quality-check: npm run quality:check || (echo '❌ Quality gates failed in CI' && exit 1)
